faq.question: What services does Henshaw’s Tech World offer?
faq.answer: We provide tech courses, web development services, and tech support to help individuals and businesses build their digital presence.

faq.question: How can I contact support?
faq.answer: You can reach us through our live chat or by using email support.

faq.question: How do I enroll in a tech course?
faq.answer: Visit our Courses page, select your desired course, and follow the registration and payment steps.

faq.question: Do you offer one-on-one mentorship?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer personalized mentorship. You can book a session through our contact page or live chat.

courses.name: Robotics
courses.about: Learn Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Python, sensors, actuators, and automation systems.
courses.next: Advance to AI-powered robotics, drone navigation, and machine vision.

courses.name: Machines
courses.about: Understand mechanical systems, automation, motors, gears, sensors, and mechatronics integration.
courses.next: Move into robotics, AI integration, and advanced mechanical simulation.
